member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc
member.summary: This service provides persistence of performance test results data.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc.SaveTestResults(BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Model.TestSuiteResult)
member.summary: Create or update the record for the given performance test results in data store. If the TestSuiteResultId property is set in the given data, then the record is updated in the data store; otherwise, a new record is created in the data store. All data associated with the test suite results (e.g., test results, system information, timing data) are cascade persisted.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc.GetTestResults(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve given performance test results from data store.
member.param: The unique ID of the performance test results to retrieve.
member.returns: The matching performance test results, or null if no matching record is found.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc.GetTestResults(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Find performance test results for tests that started between the two given dates.
member.param: The earliest time that a performance test started.
The latest time that a performance test started.
member.returns: The list of matching performance test results, or an empty list if no matching records are found.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc.GetCurrentTestResult
member.summary: Retrieves the current performance test results from the thread local storage for this thread. By using thread local storage, the current performance test results can be retrieved at any point in the architecture stack.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc.SetCurrentTestResult(BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Model.TestResult)
member.summary: Saves the given performance test result in the thread local storage for this thread. By using thread local storage, the current performance test results can be retrieved at any point in the architecture stack.
member.param: The test result object used to store results for the current performance test.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Model.TestResult
member.summary: Performance data associated with a performance test (e.g., class and method that generated this data, when it took place, how long it took, whether or not it was successful etc).

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Model.TestResultBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for holding data pertaining to a test.

member.summary: Data access layer for storing and retrieving performance monitoring results in data store.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestController
member.summary: Controller for running performance tests.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestController.RunPerfTestsInAssemblies(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Runs all performance tests found in the given list of assemblies. Uses reflection to find any classes in the given list of assemblies that have methods marked with the "PerfTest" method attribute. Each class can also mark a setup and tear down method as well with the "PerfTestSetup" and "PerfTestTearDown" method attributes. Each class should contain only one setup and one tear down method. This method returns the resultant test run data, which is also stored in the data store.
member.param: The list of assemblies to inspect for performance tests to run.
The user-supplied annotation for this test run.
member.returns: The resultant test run data, which is also stored in the data store.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestController.BeginPerfTest(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets up a performance test so that results can be kept for the test. All results from calls to this method with the same testId are associated with a single test suite result record in the data store. Call EndPerfTest() when this performance test concludes so that results can be persisted to data store.
member.param: Application-defined, unique ID for the current suite of tests. Used to aggregate test suite results into a single record in data store.
Application-defined annotation for the test suite.
The application-defined name of the type that generated this performance test.
The application-defined name of the method that generated this performance test.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestController.EndPerfTest(System.String)
member.summary: Marks the end of a performance test. Call BeginPerfTest() at the beginning of the performance test to set up the test result data.
member.param: Application-defined, unique ID for the current suite of tests. Used to aggregate test suite results into a single record in data store.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestController.SavePerfTestResults(System.String)
member.summary: Persists all test results for the given test ID in the data store. The results for all calls to BeginPerfTest() and EndPerfTest() for the given testId are aggregated into a suite of test results and persisted.
member.param: Application-defined, unique ID for the current suite of tests. Used to aggregate test suite results into a single record in data store.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestController.ClearPerfTestResults(System.String)
member.summary: Clears the performance test suite with the given test ID from memory. If a subsequent call to BeginPerfTest() is made with this test ID, then a new result set is created.
member.param: Application-defined, unique ID for the current suite of tests. Used to aggregate test suite results into a single record in data store.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.PerfTestController.#ctor(BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc,BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.ICurrentUserSvc,BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestApp
member.summary: Interface for application-specific functionality that is run by each application-defined type that runs performance tests.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestApp.Setup
member.summary: This is run before all the methods marked with the "PerfTest" attribute are run. Allows app-specific logic to set up the performance tests.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestApp.GetStats
member.summary: This is run after all the methods marked with the "PerfTest" attribute are run. Allows app-specific logic to add perf test statistics to the annotation for the performance test results persisted in the data store.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Test.IPerfTestApp.TearDown
member.summary: This is run after all the methods marked with the "PerfTest" attribute are run. Allows app-specific logic to clean up after the performance tests have run.
